(I'm sorry if there is any mode or contradiction whatsoever, I'm extremely 
tired but have to post, I'm not sure when I'll get on tomorrow, hopefully 
early though.)

Tavatron staggered to her feet, what had hit her? It obviously wasn't the 
sonic blast as she had previously thought. She took a quick look around the 
battlefield, her optics finally soming to rest on Dinobot's dirt and fluid 
covered body. Tavatron laid her staff on the ground beside her as she 
kneeled beside him. Tavatron growled to herself, he was going to get himself 
killed! She was more angry at herself than Dinobot, he was always trying to 
save her, perhaps if she was a better warrior than this wouldn't have 
happened!

Tavatron gasped when she saw the green coil wrap itself about his body. 
Tavatron breathed a sigh of relief, at least he wasn't offline... yet. She 
had to get him out of here, now. Tavatron looked down at Dinobot, concern 
etched on her dirt-streaked face as he slowly opened his optics and got in a 
kneeling position. She placed a gentle hand on his shoulder, unaware of 
Obliteracon looming only a few yards away:

"Are you alright?"

Suddenly Tavatron's gaze snapped upward, finally realizing just how much 
danger they were in. She took one quick look at Dinobot before shoving him 
to the left, out of Obliteracon's reach, while she rolled to the right. 
Unfortunatly she had failed to roll far enough to the right, and the 
shockwave from the force Obliteracon used to slam his foot on the ground 
knocked the already damaged Tavatron unconscious.
